metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9053 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue, also known as DW201703-005, was discovered in libdwarf2017-03-21. A heap-based buffer over-read in _dwarf_read_loc_expr_op() isdue to a failure to check a pointer for being in bounds (in a few places inthis function).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20180129-1
libdwarf1 - 20180129-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
